We need to make sure we are recycling and not producing more plastic garbage that will linger for hundreds of years. Please lovely ladies use used bags only don't go to stores and get stacks of new bags because even tho your intentions are golden you might be creating a bigger problem.

Rebuttal question: If this is a democracy, why are we allowing what equates to 0.6 percent of the US population to push policy or law on the majority? Resolution: Create a third single stall/toilet bathroom for families and allow anyone to use it. Thus, keeping any potential perverts that would abuse the law out of my daughters bathroom and giving those who are transgender a 'safe space' to do their business. Problem solved. Everyone's rights protected.
